summary: A ground-mounted solar installation powering irrigation and winery operations for a premier California vineyard.
description: Valley Vineyards partnered with Third Fuse Energy to install a 750 kW ground-mounted solar array on unused agricultural land. The system powers their entire irrigation network, winery equipment, and tasting room facilities.
highlights: Ground-mount system on 5 acres of land

testimonial.quote: Third Fuse Energy helped us become one of the first fully solar-powered wineries in California. Our customers love knowing their wine is produced with clean energy.
testimonial.author: Marco Bellini
